scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p images/nodejs-lambda-container/out/ && cp -r .next/standalone/ images/nodejs-lambda-container/out/ && cp -r public images/nodejs-lambda-container/out/ && cp -r .next/static images/nodejs-lambda-container/out/.next/
scripts.deploy:develop: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage develop
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage production
